Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-8961 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-8961 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.6.0-11, affected by CVE-2025-8961
